From what I've seen and from what I've heard, it all seems to be going well. And I always thought that would be the case. "What I was more concerned about was the ratings falling off a cliff, meaning that the whole genre might be over, Simon Cowell continued. "The good news is that people are still excited about these shows, whether it be... Dancing With the Stars, which has gotten better over the years, America's Got Talent.

Says Egypt's Hosni Mubarak Knows He's On the Way Out Defense Donald Rumsfeld said Egyptian President Bush Hosni Mubarak "is behaving in a way that he understands that he will eventually depart" and that the crisis in Egypt is probably best handled through private diplomacy. Donald Rumsfeld , who has known Hosni Mubarak since 1975, told ABC's Good Morning America that the United States' interest in Egypt should be focused on "having that country evolve toward freer economic systems." as encouraging investment. The bitter campaign split Italy's powerful labor unions. Sergio Marchionne praised the "courage" of workers who gave their approval. Saying yes to flexibility makes it possible to achieve very high production levels, of up to 280,000 vehicles per year, and also open the way for the potential creation of jobs, Sergio Marchionne said in a statement. "In a country such as Italy, which has always been tied to the past and reluctant to change... those who voted yes showed vision," he said.

I am enormously proud of my last decade as CEO, and I am certain that the next 10 years under Larry will be even better! Larry, in my clear opinion, is ready to lead, Eric Schmidt said in the announcement. Eric Schmidt will be transition to a new role as executive chairman. So what do we know about Google's new CEO? Bill Lockyer , California's state treasurer, participated in a national telephonic news conference with EPI officials, to denounce the bankruptcy concept. No state needs to declare bankruptcy, Bill Lockyer said, "The states have sovereign taxing power the big companies don't." Bill Lockyer 's point- a valid one- is that bankruptcy is the refuge for individuals, corporations and local governments
